evidence_example.title: Empty
evidence_example.small_descr: This is the skeleton of an EEB demo configured for the EE_FLEX board.
evidence_example.long_descr:
This is not a complete demo but works as an empty template to be used as a starting point for a new application. The part already present are:
  • Include EEB header files;
  • Configure the timer for tasks activation;
  • Set an empty main function;
  • Set the HW inside the OIL file;
